SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.client.ui

Class UI

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.client.ui.UI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUI
public abstract class UI extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing the user interface for the client. This class provides methods to interact with the client and server, and manage the game state.
See Also:
